tableCaption: Rational scale to assess the harm of recreational drug use

rows.text:
{{Hidden| headerstyle = background:PapayaWhip; font-size: 110%; border:1px solid black| header = Notes about the harm ratings| contentstyle = text-align:left;| content = {{nobold|The ''Physical harm'', ''Dependence liability'', and ''Social harm'' scores were each computed from the average of three distinct ratings. The highest possible harm rating for each rating scale is 3.0.
''Physical harm'' is the average rating of the scores for acute binge use, chronic use, and intravenous use.
''[[Substance dependence|Dependence liability]]'' is the average rating of the scores for intensity of pleasure, [[psychological dependence]], and [[physical dependence]].
''Social harm'' is the average rating of the scores for [[drug intoxication]], health-care costs, and other social harms.
''Average harm'' was computed as the average of the ''Physical harm'', ''Dependence liability'', and ''Social harm'' scores.}}}}

{{Hidden| headerstyle = background:PapayaWhip; font-size: 110%; border:1px solid black| header = Notes about the harm ratings| contentstyle = text-align:left;| content = {{nobold|The ''Physical harm'', ''Dependence liability'', and ''Social harm'' scores were each computed from the average of three distinct ratings.
